events.message: I recently received my order, but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I no longer wish to keep it.
The customer's message indicates a refund request. The issue has been categorized accordingly under the Refund cluster.
Assignment of the refund request case to one of the customer support agents specializing in returns has been completed.
